mapper.insert: insert into ecs_user_address (address_id, address_name, user_id, consignee, email, country, province, city, district, address, zipcode, tel, mobile, sign_building, best_time ) values (#{address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{province,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{city,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{district,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign_building,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{best_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ecs_user_address set address_name = #{address_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, district = #{district,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zipcode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_building = #{sign_building,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, best_time = #{best_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where address_id = #{address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select address_id, address_name, user_id, consignee, email, country, province, city, district, address, zipcode, tel, mobile, sign_building, best_time from ecs_user_address where address_id = #{address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
